ygData.messageBody:
Since it takes me 20 minutes to load I tend to just walk away during that part. :-)
luv,
-Su

>They did, don't you read those little messages on the screen during loading..
>I think a couple of the messages are "You've become better at loading" and
>something like "Loading is now .99999999 faster"!

>;-)
>Durgaa
